node.display_long_description:
Must-have bow & arrow action game with state of the art Quest graphics. 

NEW GAME MODE “SIEGE OF HEAVEN” AND QUEST 2 UPGRADES!!!

Battle through the floating castles of medieval fantasy to restore Harmony in Heaven, Purgatory & Hell. Rain down arrows against forsaken souls and angelic creatures that have taken over the afterlife.

Finally a great Roguelite on Quest, excellent great replay value that adapts to the player’s skill level and progress as they play. Three beautiful and mysterious, procedurally generated worlds, with infinite replayability, three epic boss fights, multiple optional areas with great loot.

NEW! Free DLC with gate-defense game mode “Siege of Heaven” with 3 extra maps, 50+ new achievements, and leaderboards - perfect for new players and casual VR enthusiasts and advanced players alike, enjoy VR’s highest-rated bow & arrow mechanics shooting a safe spot in a beautiful environment.

Uses VR to the max and makes the most of Quest & Quest 2.

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
Version 1.3.10

- Fixed: teleport shard teleporting player in wrong direction
- Fixed: player floating above the ground after using portal
- Fixed: white fog on enemies in pits
- Fixed: ghosts whiter than rest of environment in the distance

nodes.title: We’re ending Season 2 early, Season 3 will start on April 21st.
nodes.body_text:
Our fantastic community helped us spot some issues in high-level play scoring that we felt needed addressing. We wouldn’t want these issues to affect how the game’s played, so we’re ending Season 2 much sooner than originally planned. Season 3 will start soon with proper adjustments.

On April 21st:
- All players will earn experience and ranks for their placement on the leaderboard
- Season 3 will begin with NEW LEADERBOARDS
- Player progress % will be retained between seasons
- Ranks from previous seasons will be rewarded with weapon skins
- High level scoring system will be fixed and rebalanced
  
The time is coming for your final runs and high scores. Now is a good moment to ensure your experience, rewards, and fame!

Stay tuned!

nodes.title: In Death: Unchained now supports bHaptics TactSuit
nodes.body_text:
Hey everyone!

We’re excited to let you know about collaboration between us and bHaptics. We hope that through their technology our game will allow you to not only see the afterlife experience but to feel it on your own skin.

VR technology is still new and developing and we think that it is accessories such as haptic suits that set its milestones. bHaptics created a TactSuit - wireless haptic vest that packs multiple individually controllable vibro-tactile motors with positional haptic feedback delivered to every corner of your body. Thanks to bHaptics this kind of technology is no longer reserved for sci-fi movies, but is now available to a wider group of users.

For an adrenaline pumping VR game like In Death: Unchained where you can get shot, thrown at with an axe, fireballed and more, support for this type of technology is a natural next step. A high-quality haptic suit shall provide an immersive, extremely real even though still virtual experience.


Let us know if you like it!

node.reviewDescription:
🤦‍♂️Just realised I had suggested that if you have low health don’t bother trying to take out the first Boss , just quit. Sorry , NOT quit the game itself but quit trying to take him out. DO go into his lair , to take some extra points , Die and keep your achievements for that session.

Original review.

Live, Die , Repeat.
Simple.

But it takes some stamina and grit and determination to just keep going back in , but you do.
I have , after many , many days , unlocked the next level. You genuinely feel you have worked flipping hard to get there and you bellow with true glory and success at the end of the first part. 
Can you progress as a beginner , oh yes you can . It is your destiny to do so. This is VR and this is a brutal lesson in full immersive gameplay , strategy and technique. It’s what we all wanted is it not ?

So how can you hope to survive ? ,

Get high onto roof tops, scout out cover , stay at a distance wherever possible.
Start high , work your way down.
When you are ready ,drop down , get behind them. They hesitate , you hit. Get back on a roof top quick. 
Plan your escape. High-Low-High-Low , confuses the hell out of them.

Shoot down into doorways and windows to tease them out , they are idiots and run to where your arrow hits the ground. They look around , hesitate. They die.
Send special arrows into corridors from outside first , clears the “air” as they all get caught up in ricochet and multiple explosions.

Hit every visible enemy at least once each. They stumble , you hit them again. They die. Weaken them from afar and teleport into the middle of them , headshot at close quarters , they die.

Make all the hooded monks come to you , they are arrogant , they wail at you when they arrive. You don’t hesitate. Headshot. They die. Remind them NEVER to come that close to you , ever.

Use the rocks and ice covered ground. Knights and Gouls don’t appear to jump or climb. They stand staring at you. They die. Simple.
You can do a lot of damage from outside the Save Towers. Taunt them and get them onto the bridges and walkways. Go high. They Die.
Aim to stand on parapets and walls , gives you an edge as they run at you

Use the flaming arrows and ball of lightning arrows to weaken large groups. NEVER EVER jump down into a nest of the buggers. YOU DIE.
Ball of Lightning arrows mess with their minds and weakens . Pick them off. You are John Wick of Hell, remember this.

Knights are good at protecting themselves with shields. So , hit their legs instead , strike their arms too.

You can beat the first Boss. You can. Have full quiver of the most deadly arrows possible , explosive too. Need FULL health . Get it , buy it.
Only go in to his lair with full health. Hit him quickly in the head. Dodge around with your teleport arrow, get behind the buggers. Don’t breathe just shoot.

Final time , no 6 , I had 75 Cataclysm III arrows and 2 Holy Armour upgrades , he dropped like a bowling pin in fairly quick time . Had to stay close to him and fire rapidly.
Other equally deadly combinations of arrow do work but explosive properties are potent.
It gets easier ( ? ) as you gain more achievements and therefore more powerful arrows so patience required.

Go direct to his lair IF you at full strength , avoid the hassle  of the ruins before-hand , nothing is gained running around here like a loon. You loose health and it’s a long walk back to a tower.
IF your health is already low , mop up in the ruins and quit while ahead . Go to his lair just to chalk up some extra points and keep your achievements gained that session.

You practice , you learn , you master.
Live Die Repeat .

And then there is Paradise , oh boy ! It starts all over again but now they are much grumpier and very , very keen to kill you.
Ha, Ha , Ha bring it on yer buggers.

This is a true VR game , in fact a superbly crafted game in any format , of the highest calibrate and the developers have set the stage  for a classic that will be remembered , enjoyed , and played for a long time. 

Get it , and get stuck in.

🏹 ( no more edits , promise 💕)
node.reviewTitle: Final Review Edit. All still brilliant !

Must-have bow & arrow action game with state of the art Quest graphics. 

NEW GAME MODE “SIEGE OF HEAVEN” AND QUEST 2 UPGRADES!!!

Grab your bow and rain down arrows against forsaken souls and angelic creatures that have taken over the afterlife, battle through the beautiful medieval fantasy levels of Heaven, Purgatory & Hell to restore Harmony
